archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0956
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want the ability to reverse a payment from an individual customers account that has been applied incorrectly

properties.value: Can you please explain how does the process of payment reversing shoud look like? Comarch should configure integration that will automatically trigger refund for customer? If so what should happed if e.g. credit/debit card is not valid anymore?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
